title: Set Log In Attempts - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: You can specify the number of log in attempts that can be allowed before the admin user is locked out of the UI. The default setting allows up to 5 failed login attempts. To set log in attempts: To change the default go to Settings > Administration > Admins . On the top right-hand side, click the Tools icon to modify the allowed number of log in attempts. Click Save .
